website_summaries.verdict: This option has a relatively simple design that's similar to our Best Bang for the Buck pick, but adjustable recline positions might sweeten the deal for some.
pros: Harness and headrest both adjust in one action
Offers three easy to adjust recline positions
InRight LATCH system boosts installation confidence
Nifty cup holder for bottles, snacks, or trinkets
cons: Cup holder might be too narrow for sippy cups with handles

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a compact car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for a compact car. I drive a Hyundai Elantra and this fits both rear and front facing. It leaves enough room on either side for additional passengers, and does not require that the front seats be pushed up too far/too close to the dash.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Broken release lever
customer_reviews.text: At first this car seat was exactly what we needed. It fit in my Subaru and my son was comfy and secure. About 11 months after we purchased it the the release lever broke away from the seat. We contacted Graco and they agreed to send a new seat because it was within 1 year of purchase. This was great except the seat had to be returned first and we had thrown away the box. They sent the same seat very quickly and costumer service was excellent. However 4 months later the same thing happened on the new seat, and this happened while we were away on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: kindle customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. It’s way easy to move in and out of vehicles, and super easy to adjust the straps on. The additional cushioned insert with cushioned headrest is perfect for your baby when they’re small and can be removed once it’s no longer necessary and your child is bigger. Plus it’s super easy to pull the cushioned liners out and wash them in the wash. Also the baby cup/bottle holder is awesome now that our son has figured out what it’s for. It also holds snacks too so that’s convenient!
customer_reviews.author: QuarterCircle2C

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: The straps are impossible to tighten using the pulling strap by the crotch, even while pushing the button. I do not recommend this seat and would not buy it again. Without being able to tighten appropriately it is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Rp

customer_reviews.title: I drive a 2010 Chevy Camaro (a two door sports car) and this seat actually fits better than my son's infant seat
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this carseat because I was afraid it wasn't going to fit in my car. To my surprise IT FIT! I drive a 2010 Chevy Camaro (a two door sports car) and this seat actually fits better than my son's infant seat. My son is 6mo 18lbs and fits in this seat perfectly. The only issue I have is that I have to put my son in the seat by climbing in the backseat but it's really not that bad. I gave this carseat 4 stars only because I have not tried to hook it up forward facing. Hope this review helps someone with a 2door car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let your child get sick in this!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this car seat for a year now. This is my third child so I have owned many car seats. I love the removable pads. However after a 12 hour car trip and two vomits later, I have finally had to wash the straps. They are not removable. If they are it is so hard to figure out and the product manual does not help. Try sitting in a hotel bathroom trying to hand wash strap that have been puked all over with the car seat still attached! My only guess is tomorrow they will still smell like vomit! So if someone knows how to undo these straps, I would love to hear!
customer_reviews.author: ELKS

customer_reviews.title: Cleanup is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve had one of these with my first two children. I am sold! I recommend this to people who are tired of completely dismantling a car seat to wash it. Kids can be messy and if you travel and they are snacking or if they spill their sippycup/bottle or get carsick.... this is a breeze to clean up! My 18 mo son spilled a sippy cup of chocolate milk and I was able to just pop off the material and wash it and pop it back on. Game changer! It’s worth the extra money! The material doesn’t scratch him and it’s pretty plush. This definitely gets a 5 outta 5 from our family.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought we liked this car seat - seems comfy, toddler can reach cup holder, easy to install. I recently took the cover off to wash it and the styrofoam part under the cover that surrounds your precious littles head was not attached to the seat - you can see where some adhesive was applied but I guess had worn off. The styrofoam clearly states “Do not remove.” I emailed Graco and never received a response. Very disappointed in this seat and the customer service from Graco.
customer_reviews.author: FlashyBrain

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but Quality is a bit questionable...
customer_reviews.text: When first received I loved this car seat. Perfect for my now 4 year old. The convenience of taking the fabric off without struggling is a wonderful upgrade. Only issue I have is that I am now washing for the third time and the head foam has already broken and come apart from the headrest. I have no idea how to fix this and think this car seat may no longer be any good. I am going to contact the seller to inquire about a replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. I have 3!
customer_reviews.text: I have these for all my kids. I love the easily removable cover so you don’t have to uninstall the car seats every time they need cleaned. Self adjusting straps when you adjust the height. I really like that I can adjust the height so easily, if my 7 year old brother is riding with me I can quickly adjust one to fit him instead of the 3 year old. Would be great if you transport multiple kids and want to keep something in your vehicle. Higher upper limit on weight means my kids will be able to use these for a long time
customer_reviews.author: ky24

customer_reviews.title: Great for car and air travel too
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this car seat for over a year now, and only as a forward facing seat. It super easy to adjust to a growing toddler. The Latch system always seems a pain to install no matter what kind of car seat, but the seat belt like buttons on it make it easy to grab the latch and release. I wouldn’t recommend this seat for frequently moving between vehicles, once it’s in, it a hassle to move it around. We’ve traveled on an airplane with this seat as well. Besides being heavy and bulky, it did great. We plan to buy another one when our youngest is the right age for forward facing.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Oakes

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST
customer_reviews.text: Graco keeps getting better and better and is way ahead of the rest. Anything they can find to do better they do it. My daughter and I were rear-ended and she was in the same car seat, she came out with a minor bump on her head, and I had more severe injuries. We were told that if she were in a booster or any other type of seat she would have been ejected at the speed we were hit. She is FIVE, and 45 lbs, and still in this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken within less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this car seat less than a year and the plastic piece that holds the tightening strap at the crotch has already broken, making this car seat much less safe. I’m really sorry we bought this one. Graco did refund 100% of the purchase price, though it took months and multiple contacts to them on our part.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Graco is a quality and safe brand!
customer_reviews.text: Update: We were in a bad car accident. Both sides of the car we're smashed and it rolled over. The car seat stayed hooked in tightly the ENTIRE time, and probably saved my sons life. He had no injuries at all. I'll definitely be buying this one again since we need a replacement now. Thank you. So many positions, sturdy and safe! Police inserted this in the back seat because they are trained to insert children's seats for optimum saety in case of a crash. He stated also that this car seat is very safe, sturdy and can be adjusted in many ways as my grandson gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Salgueiro

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat!
customer_reviews.text: When my girls and I were in an accident where the car rolled over, my youngest was safely restrained in this seat. I LOVE this seat! Straps are easy to adjust, recline positions keep them comfortable, and the additional safety features are wonderful! Before purchasing this seat I researched many options but this is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is our second car seat same one just a different color.. we bought an extra so we have one in both cars. My daughter is 3 1/2 and still has room for her to grow. We’ve had it since she turned 1 and it’s still in great condition.. it’s heavy enough that you feel safe with your child in it but not to heavy that it’s a pain to remove... cleaning is a breeze.. throw it in the washer hang to dry and it’s like brand new (after you wipe the straps down?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, especially if your kid is a higher weight percentile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat. My daughter has been riding in it since she was 11mo. We've taken some long trips and she's been comfortable and had no trouble sleeping in it. It's easy to clean and to install. Getting the straps tightened correctly takes some practice. And I like that it has a little pocket on the back to hold the user manual. It's also nice that the kid can be rear facing up to 40lbs. Pediatricians recommend children rear face until at least two years old (safer in a car accident) and my daughter should be able to make it to 2 while still under 40 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Buy a britax.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this car seat! Not only is it a total pain to install (comparing to Britax ClickTight), but it’s also really difficult to get my daughter in tightly enough. For whatever reason, the tether pulls to a certain point and then it just does not want to pull any more. We have to use our full body strength and I’m still not satisfied. We have 2 seats for my car, and 2 for my husbands. This is by far the worst. We will be purchasing a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Nycole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, go with Britax
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is difficult to tighten when installing. There should be less than an inch of give in any direction and it's nearly impossible to do this with this seat. It's also a hassle to get the straps tight enough on child's shoulders. All the pulling and adjusting led the strap to fray in about a year and a half of use. We bought this as a second seat in addition to a Britax Marathon and the Britax far exceeds the quality and ease of use, we are trashing this seat and replacing it after only 1.5 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: kr837

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to tighten straps
customer_reviews.text: WAY too hard to tighten the straps. No matter how hard I pull or even if I loosen them all the way out and start all over the straps don't tighten enough. You shouldn't be able to pinch the straps/fold the strap fabric and I always can. I wish I hadn't bought this. Now that I know it's a problem I see other reviews here that say the same. Buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Belhumeur

customer_reviews.title: Nice but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat for rear and forward facing. Switched my sons to this around 10 months. Once they were too heavy for me to carry in the infant seat. It can be used from birth but I prefer if they fall asleep in the car to be able to just carry them in the car seat. It’s a bulky seat. If you have more than 1 kid in the car in this seat you won’t be able to fit a 3rd car seat. It also doesn’t convert into a booster or high back booster so you will eventually have to purchase another car seat but probably not until they are 5 years or older.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: So easy to get in and out of the car! The hook system is high tech and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a second car seat for my daughter, and I like it better than the other Graco one we have for our other car! You can still buckle it using the seatbelt, but we decided to try the hooks in the car and OMG. Compared to every other seat we've owned, this was by far the easiest to install, get tight, and so easy to release! It's super safe. Everything about it is wonderful. Got this on black friday, and it was a steal! Totally love it.
customer_reviews.author: lastingmemories.byellen

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I received it today the padding is better than expected, it is very easy to install. The insurrection booklet was easy to read and understand, but there is also several instruction video's on you tube. My little guy was happy to get rid of his infant car seat, this one is nice and roomy, but still secure. I have a Toyota Avalon, the car seat fir and balanced perfectly. So glad I choose this one. I read lots of reviews on Amazon and Target, Walmart, etc this one seemed consistent with high feedback marks, it was a few dollars cheaper, faster shipping and if you have prime, free shipping on Amazon also. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good seat
customer_reviews.text: I love the fast install with the quick latch. It's my favorite feature. I do not like that there is only one rear facing recline position. It doesn't work that well with the back seat in my car as it's almost too reclined and my kid hates that. Also, the car seat holds in heat too much for the summer months. Overall, it's not awful. I just wish it was a little more adjustable. I'd like more than 3 recline settings, or at least one that's in between 2 and 3 for the older rear facing children.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: BEST car seat ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat we’ve had and this is our third. Bought it over a year ago and still not over how awesome it is! SO easy to install/uninstall, easy to tighten straps, hardly any hassle at all to remove cover to wash it. Takes all the annoyance out of car seats. Wish I could tell everyone about this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Savannah

customer_reviews.title: One side is loose
customer_reviews.text: We paid a lot for this carseat, so we're making it work. However, we've had the worst time tightening the harness. One side gets tight while the other side is really loose. We've reinstalled it numerous times. Eventually, we used a locking pin in the back as a temporary fix. I wouldn't buy this again though. In fact, when we buy another carseat for our other vehicle, it probably won't be a graco just because of all the hassle we've gone through with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Coghlan

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat
customer_reviews.text: This convertible car seat is absolutely wonderful. I was so nervous when it was time to move my son into one of these but this was a breeze to operate. The manual is simple to read along with a lot of the info on the side of the car seat when installing. It automatically looks safe and the features just make it better. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chad K.

customer_reviews.title: Chunky seat
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I couldn’t get the graco seat my oldest has as the price jumped. This seat is wider, chunkier construction and fluffier pads. It has a smooth fabric. Relatively easy to remove to wash. Only one recline level and it feels too far and pushes the passenger seat forward. I trust Graco’s seats. I just wish they wouldn’t discontinue seats so quickly. I bought the other one only a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: hayrhea

customer_reviews.title: We have no regrets with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this car seat! It is a great purchase at a great price. I feel like my baby is so comfy and so safe in it and he seems to enjoy it too. It’s not over the top and fancy like some you can find but we aren’t worried about that. The one cup holder is a great size. This car seat is lightweight and does not take up tons of space, which is wonderful in my Chevy captiva. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alanah White

customer_reviews.title: and for good reason. Easy to install & easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Size4Me, and for good reason. Easy to install & easy to adjust, which makes it perfect for parents trying to be sure their child is safe! Our son used this rear facing until 3yo, and now uses it forward facing (he's 4) and found it comfortable both ways. Cute patterns with easy to clean removable covers are just the cherry on top. Absolutely wonderful seat, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jess H

customer_reviews.title: Spend money on something else
customer_reviews.text: I now have 2 of these so I feel confident saying it’s well designed...on paper. Unfortunately, all the features it has mean nothing since it’s so difficult to install you won’t be able to get it to meet all legal requirements. Too much horizontal shifting and good luck getting the little “level” ball within its appropriate zone. You’ll be busting out pulleys and ratchet straps and throwing out your back only to find one or other still doesn’t meet legal requirements.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment strap latch came out.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these seats. 1 for each vehicle. This piece popped out on both seats. Graco is refunding us but I'm without a seat at all. It takes around 8 weeks for refund. They broke within the 4 weeks of each other. I'm a stay at home mom and she rarely uses her seats. We used them 8-9 months when they broke. I feel they should be recalled. This is unsafe. I'm lucky it happened at home and not while I was stuck out some place. The seats are easy to clean. We loved the easy tether latch system and easy adjustable straps/headrest. I would suggest purchasing a different clone of this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great for compact car installation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! We have a lot of car seats and this one is one of my favorites. It’s super easy to install and I love that I can easily remove the cover to machine wash. We use this one rear facing in our Chevy Cruze and there is still plenty of leg room for the front passenger. I have a maxi-cosi Magellan which costs way more and that one is way bulkier and way harder to install. I also have a Graco 4ever and that one is amazing, it’s what led me to getting this one. Graco forever!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a quality car seat
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a comfortable quality car seat and so far our 2 year old has enjoyed it. The Graco brand is a trusted brand that we have known for years and this seat appears to be well made There are numerous features that I like about it, including the ease of connection to the vehicle LATCH system, the comfortable padding, the ease of loosening/tightening the seat belt once the child is in, and of course the cup holder. It's a good seat for a fair price
customer_reviews.author: That Helpful Dad

customer_reviews.title: Graco is a great company! Awesome carseat!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect convertible car seat! I've always been a huge fan of Graco, so it was easy to pick one for my child! I like that this one has rapid remove so it's easy to take the cover off to wash if any spills etc happen. It is super easy to install! I have it in my 2012 Subaru Outback rear facing, and there is still some room for the passenger in the front seat. Overall amazing product, Graco never dissapoints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid-range to upper mid-range car seat
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Bought two, one for each car, and look forward to our daughter getting the proper use out of this one. Did not put her in anything but an infant carrier until she was about 22 pounds, and won't put her rear facing until we reach the limit on this one. Good feel, easy to adjust, fairly straightforward to install. We did need a towel under it for the proper rear-facing angle in our 2007 Jeep Grand Cherokee, but not for our 2011 Chevy Cruze
customer_reviews.author: TWilliam

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install
customer_reviews.text: Wow after struggling putting the britax in my car I learned the click latch adaptors are a must rather than the basic hook latched. Literally took one minute to install however I did need a second person to push down on the seat while I pulled the strap tight which was no big deal! Also the seat is like so it will be easy to transfer to another vehicle if needed. By the way I put this in my mom's hyundai Elantra which is a very small car and it fit just fine behind the passenger seat giving the passenger side plenty of room up front. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy we went with this car seat for my 1-year-old. It is every easy to adjust when needed, it is a good size for both my car and my husband's SUV and it is super soft padding for my little guy. It is a little hard to tighten but I watched a tutorial on YouTube that recommended pulling the straps from behind and now I feel like he is very secure. Also, this seat is easy to install. Overall I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MamaW

customer_reviews.title: Really like the padding on this seat
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a car seat that offered protection without breaking the bank. Gave the Graco MySize 65 a try. Really like the padding on this seat. Cupholder is nice and not intrusive on the seat design. My son doesn't seem to mind sitting in this. The straps are pretty easy to put on as they pull out a ways. How my back seat is set up....I was unable to snugly get this fit in the center so had to settle for having it installed to the side. My only complaint is that the straps are hard to pull tight.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Lemense

customer_reviews.title: So far, it’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s not extremely easy to get my son buckled and unbuckled. The chest clip is awkward to clip for some reason. Also, I can’t tighten the straps enough, so I can’t loosen/tighten the straps each time I put him in the car (which is what I liked to do with his old seat). The sides of the head rest also stick out a lot, so I have to be REALLY careful not to smack his head on them when I get him out of the car. This will be a major headache once he’s heavier 😞
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love our size4me car seat! We have used an evenflo and this car seat is way better. I love that my child’s head is supported and when she falls asleep her head does not drop down and look painful like it does with the evenflo. We will definitely be buying another one of these for my wife’s car and will be getting rid of the evenflo car seat! I have not had to take the fabric off to wash but I can’t wait to see how it does...this was one of the reasons I bought this one...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Herman

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this when I felt like my son wasn't super comfortable in his bucket seats anymore, and because he was too heavy to keep carrying that thing around. I did lots of research trying to find the best bang for my buck and ended here. We absolutely couldn't be happier with this seat! And I love the colors, too. It's so easy to pull everything off and wash. He had a really bad blowout in it at one point, and taking a toothbrush to the straps was all the hard labor I had to do. Spray n wash and the washing machine did the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Drummond

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but not enough leg room
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice seat and I like that I can pull the cover off without having to take out the straps. However, removing the cover is not as easy as the description sounds. I still have to take the seat out of my car to be able to put it back on. Also, my daughter is running out of leg room and is only 18 months old. If I had to buy a new seat I would probably choose one that has the extender for the child's feet so she has more room.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Reed

customer_reviews.title: Loose shoulder straps
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping it was a great product, but I think I got a defective product, the shoulders straps keeps getting loose no matter how u tighten it that my daughter was able to get her hands out basically leaving her secureby the hip, it happened so many times while we were driving, ufff Scarry Anyone else had this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. We have a 3.5 year old that is in the older model, and had to buy additional car sets for our 10 month old who has transitioned out of his infant carrier. This newer model looks so sleek, I love it! Can't beat the price, either. Highly recommend these car seats, the detachable liner is great for running through the wash when spills happen.. because lets be honest... these get messy.
customer_reviews.author: WSU_08

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this seat. Its comfy for her and its super easy to clean and easy to move from car to car. Easy to take when traveling. I ised a nuby car seat gate check bag and it fits in there perfectly. Not too heavy either but seems of great quality. I love the latches on this one and theyre easier than the older modeled car seats with these tough hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Del Toro Family

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. When rear facing there is very limited room for the kids legs/feet. Our Graco 35 infant seat had more room for the little ones legs but she ran out of room at the top of the seat. If your kids head is within 1 inch of the top of the seat it’s time to get a bigger chair. The nice part of this seat (graco 65) is you can adjust the head level with the kid seated and not have to worry about pulling the seat out of the car to fix it. Padding is nice and easy to wipe down between washes.
customer_reviews.author: RachNDave

customer_reviews.title: This is a great car seat
customer_reviews.text: There are things I really liked about this car seat.. the automatic strap adjustment.. the seat tilt.. the cushion for the lumber support... all great, but I got it for my 3 year old... and the bottom buckle would pinch her legs and bruise them. She cried every time I latched them.. So I switched it to use for my 8 month old... whose chubby legs are also pinched.. I’m pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kj Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Safety is my first concern
customer_reviews.text: I have an older car, 2008 Corolla. The seat came with an 85 page book..lol! Needless to say it covered every possible scenario and I was able to install without any issues. I bought this seat for my granddaughter after reading the reviews, it had almost a 5-star rating which made my decision easy. My granddaughter is my most precious cargo❤
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Convertible, Especially for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is as a secondary seat for my truck since my wife has our primary Britax Boulevard clicktight convertible in her car. Although this seat cost me about 1/3 of what the Boulevard cost, there are actually some things we like better about it! Plenty of padding for comfort, the straps are easy to tighten, my son loves using the cupholder, it's easy to clean, and most importantly is a very safe seat!
customer_reviews.author: KP Texan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it. I have the Graco extend to fit in our primary car and as baby just turned 1 decided to upgrade the back up seat from a bucket seat to convertible. I didn't want to spend a whole lot on a seat she rarely uses but wanted something safe and easy for dad to manipulate. Love the no thread harness adjustments. With the exception of the additional leg space the seat seems near identical to her extend to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Guillot

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an extra car seat for grandmothers small SUV. The seat was much nicer than I expected. Chubby, tall baby girl (97%) seems comfortable. Straps easy to adjust. FYI: The flowery head support and flowery seat padding are both only necessary for an infant; so if you're put off by the flowers, know they are only temporary. Seat was easy to install and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Br & Ca

customer_reviews.title: Nice carseat... I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and beautiful carseat. Looks comfortable.. but i can't speak for my 1 yr old! It was very easy to install. I love the color, just enough with being overwhelming. I hate the all pink... it shows dirt too easily and i just don't like pink. I'd definitely buy it again. My only suggestion, which I'm not sure why i didn't do in the first place, would be to make sure the straps are in the right position for your child before installing. I was just excited to get the seat put in.
customer_reviews.author: redd

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. Between our two boys we have had 4 of these (including the old version). Easy to install and adjust, relatively easy to clean. Adjustable headrest allows this to fit rear-facing in my back seat behind the driver's or passenger's seat (not possible with some one-piece molded seats). Wait for it to go on sale though (throw it in your cart and wait for Amazon to tell you the price has dropped - if you're not in a rush you can likely save $30+ this way).
customer_reviews.author: Eslieb

customer_reviews.title: Four year old and four month old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat in purple almost 2 years ago for my daughter who is now 4 1/2 years old. I LOVE this car seat and so does she. She’ll be able to use this for a long while yet, she’s still under 40 lbs. I also have a 4 month old and I just bought another one for her since she’s getting really heavy to tote around in an infant seat already! It’s easy to connect in the car and easier to adjust everything on it. Also, the colors and patterns are cute and even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: SaSh88

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old daughter and it works amazing! It's rather large rear facing so keep that in mind. I have a Jeep Cherokee and her seat is on the drivers side and it leans right up against my seat. It's fine because I don't need to go back anymore but just food for thought. The color is adorable and it's insanely easy to install. I have an Extend2Fit in our other car but I prefer this one. It seems more secure and durable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Temzz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit all vehicles. Base too big!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so... I absolutely love this carseat except it doesn't fit in my 2010 Dodge Ram. Not even close to fitting! At least not safely. If you read to manual and do as it says to properly install it it does not and will not work for that truck. However it does fit perfectly in my 2005 Ford Focus. So although I do like it and especially love how comfortable and easy is is to use it just doesn't work for the vehicle I originally bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The 1st thing I really like about this car seat, aside from safety, is that' it's easy to install. This car seat is attractive, appears to be comfortable, and is made to be easy to clean. I bought it for a very reasonable price and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good One ..
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a week now and I am liking it. It's quite stable. However, the only issue is, Locking the straps in the car seat is not very well designed. You have to put little effort to secure the child. I was using Safety 1st Convertible and was not very happy with that. It was not very stable and the latch was getting very lose after using few days. Now with Graco, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat but wish I would have got ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat but wish I would have got a Nautilus 65 LX but it’s a great car seat. My husbands truck is older so this seat was only used front facing. Wish I would have known that before I ordered this. It came and it was perfect but of course it had to do with the truck. This is ferret for my 15 month old but can be smaller for bigger or wider kids. My son is petite up he looks big in this car seat. It’s more narrow. Good car seat tho
customer_reviews.author: cberry

customer_reviews.title: Best carseat purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I got this carseat and absolutely love it! It's so easy to use. My daughter has plenty of room. When I purchased this I didn't realize how much cushion there was until I received it. My daughter love being in it. She doesn't cry at all. It is super easy to remove and wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Curious customer

customer_reviews.title: The best car seats I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these seats. The recline feature is the best. My babies have head and neck support when they fall asleep. I had purchased COSCO convertible seats and I wasn’t happy with them. Now we use those for my husband’s car since they primarily ride in mine. I got a good deal on them too. Totally worth it to me. The install was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Broke just tightening the straps when loading up my daughter this morning. Was just tight enough that it was difficult to get her out and almost had to cut the straps. This car seat isn’t even 2 years old and there is no way the chintzy piece of plastic holding that bolt in would hold up in an accident. Very disappointed & we have 3 of these in the same model. Refuse to put her in any of them now so had to fork out $400 for new ones from a competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea

customer_reviews.title: I actually like the last model better.
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the last model better. This didn't have the turn nob for adjusting the straps which I found more user friendly. It also seems that the bottom buckle is deeper in the seat or something. Harder to get snapped in. If I could do over would have saved the money and bought the last model which was still available.
customer_reviews.author: Even66

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: safety comes first and this seat has all of the features you expect with a Graco seat ! but the real reason i am leaving this review is because it is so easy to clean. you can remove the cover without uninstalling the seat !! so great for those accidents that kids are bound to have !! I have had my share of different seats (3 children) and i could not believe how easy this was to clean.
customer_reviews.author: F. Amar

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat, it is very easy to use. We have had a couple and this one out performs the other ones. We now have this car seat for her parents, my mom and myself. I have a friend that borrowed mine and she ended up going out and buying one also.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Safe but a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Like any modern LATCH car seat, this installed easily and was simple to tighten and get oriented properly. It's easy to adjust properly for my son's height. The buckle holding feature is a nice idea, but not often used. My only slight gripe is that the side cushions for the head are a little narrow, and though my son does not have a huge head (10 mos old) it restricts his ability to turn his head. It touches both ears at once -- it's that narrow. But it seems very safe, and that's why we buy these for our kids, after all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Armbrust

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in a Ford Focus
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fits perfect in my '10 Ford focus. I'm only 5'5" so I put the seat rear facing behind the driver seat and it fits perfectly. Exactly what i needed. Plus there's still room for 2 other kids in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: sarodden

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat so much! It comes apart easily to wash, which is a must. My daughter can sleep in it without her head bobbing around. It is slimmer than most convertible car seats without paying $300 or more for it. I drive a small SUV and it is currently rear facing and fits in it just fine. I would buy this seat again and again, if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: cdavis

customer_reviews.title: Great seat - somewhat hard to tighten straps
customer_reviews.text: So far we've been using this rear facing for a few months and it seems great! My daughter seems comfortable and she uses the cupholder. My only complaint thus far is that to tighten the straps is a bit hard to do. It takes some serious muscle. My husband has this same seat in his car and its not AS hard to tighten. I think after time, maybe it breaks-in and is easier to tighten??
customer_reviews.author: Julia Gulia

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to figure out how to make straps longer l. The cover comes off to wash easily super important. Not good for a child that isn’t walking or doesn’t sit up on their own unless you have a great stroller to transfer them into.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Nice updated product
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace our car seats after a minor accident. This is the updated version of the seat we had, and they have fixed some of the problems in the previous version, specifically it's much easier to tighten the straps. The fabric is a little nicer. My son really loves the new seat.
customer_reviews.author: Beth R.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat and great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have this carseat for my daughter that was purchased almost 3 years ago. I love hers so I purchased another for my son. They have made many updates to it, such as the easy to remove cover for washing and thr design of the strap pads. We love this seat and cannot get over what a great seat it is, especially for the price. It is also super easy to install. We have also purchased the more expensive extend to fit and I much prefer this seat to the extend to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one that I use for grandchildren. It is easier than others I have used to install in vehicle. It has more padding than others and converts easily from rear facing to front facing. It is also a manageable weight. Some are too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lohr

customer_reviews.title: We love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat! It fits our 14-month-old perfectly and he has fallen asleep in it several times, so it must be comfortable. It's not the easiest to install, but the pads are easy to take apart for washing. It came out looking new and easy to put back on. Has lots of options for adjustability and we will able to use it for several years. So great for the price as compared to other sets that are much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Spence

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and remove
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat out there. I can install and remove VERY EASILY!!!! I was sick fighting with the traditional latch clips. The easy to press button is a game changer. Seat is also super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SmallDogs

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do have some things that I like about this carseat, and many that I don't. I like the compact, price, and many positions of adjustments... The crotch starp needs to be longer! I have a very small long legged child and my little one has slender legs, but... I am very afraid of strapping my babe in and pinching skin.... The strap cushions feel cheap...I know it a small thing, and maybe I am being too picky, but when I have red marks on my child for a 5 minute test and trial for the seat.. I have to send it back...
customer_reviews.author: tands

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: After having issues with our previous car seat (different brand) we chose this. It was a God send! Our baby’s head is secure, doesn’t fall forward and I feel like she is strapped in more safely than she was in the other. I also love the pattern. The easy adjust shoulder straps are AWESOME. I love this car seat. I am glad I chose it and got rid of the other one!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value but hard to tighten in rear fscing position
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The only issue we have had is in the second rear facing position it is hard to get the straps tightened. So I grab the straps on the back if the carseat with one hand and pull them tight while pulling the tightening strap. I love the easy adjust shoulder height of the straps. Edited to add: After having my twins in theirs for over a year now, the tightening strap is fraying a bit around the edges. But we still loved it so much we bought a 3rd for my daughter too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Civic duty to bump down rating of this thing.
customer_reviews.text: not sure why everyone is raving over this thing. No way it lasts long enough to convert from infant to booster without falling apart. Cheap piece of plastic with some sweaty synthetic cover that was pulling apart at the seams after un-boxing. I was sold by some mom's review that said it used superior materials, obviously she doesn't know what that means. 60 bucks is about what this is worth, not 150.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Works great for a smaller car
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Works great for a smaller car. The padding that comes with it is very nice. Thick and comfortable for baby. And the headrest offers great cushion and support as well. Easy adjustable straps/harness. No messing around with adjusting the strap through the loops in the back. Easy to get my son in and out of. Love the car seat. And the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: We chose to buy this car seat for our 16-month-old because: 1) the Black Friday price was amazing! 2) a friend had already done a ton of car seat research and landed on this one for her second baby 3) it goes from newborn to 65 lbs so we can get a lot of use out of it The things we love the most are the headrest/shoulder strap easy adjuster thing, the amount of room she has in the seat, and the comfy/easy to clean padding. It fits snugly behind the driver's seat of my blazer, so there's room for other car seats if necessary down the road. We haven't found anything we don't like about this seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice car seat, Upon taking it out of the box the babies where hooked and loved it right away. And once we got a chance to inspect it after babies where done, we were quite pleased as well. Installation was a breeze, very easy. And getting the babies in and out of it is pretty easy as well. They seem to be very snug and secure. Although the babies don't seem to love the car seat as much when they are strapped into it rather than climbing on it. But I feel safe and would definitely buy more Graco products.
customer_reviews.author: fred shananaquet

customer_reviews.title: Great for Infants!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for car seat that would accommodate my baby. He is too big for the infant carrier and needed something a little more. I looked at several online places and found this same one with awesome reviews then I looked to Amazon for pricing and it was cheaper.. I have enjoyed it and glad I purchased it!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA CARTWRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the car seats I’ve ever bought this one has been my favorite and I don’t have one complaint about it because it’s made so well. It’s easy to adjust the straps, put in and take out of your vehicle, easy to take the covers off to wash and the best thing about it is that it has two holders to put the clips in so you can put your baby/child in it easily..so it’s frustration free
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, easy to put in and take out, but only 1 cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put in and take out of my Edge. Only downside is that there aren't two cup holders. Once I have the chance to wash the fabric, I'll update my review but so far nothing but GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Lena465

customer_reviews.title: Great for extended rear facing
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat so much. I had one for my daughter so when it was time to upgrade my sons i bought the same. Easy install, easy to clean. Doesnt take much room for rear facing. All around a great car seat that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My ten month old is a pretty big girl (lovable)
customer_reviews.text: My ten month old is a pretty big girl (lovable). The convertible care seats just didn't work for her anymore as she would get hot and cranky fast. This is a great seat and very versatile. It's worth the money and our daughter loves it. The best one I could find on the market. Very happy and so is our baby!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Love this choice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace my son's infant car seat. This is an amazing seat, and super easy to install. It's well padded, and my son has no problems doing long trips in this (3 + hours). Very comfortable. I like the fact that he is very secure in this seat, and I have the option to do rear or front facing. This will fit him until the need for a booster seat arises. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat, great value, goodlooking too
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you need in a carseat. It's sturdy, easy to install and has all the features you could wish for (cupholder, adjustable harness and headpiece, easy-to-clean etc..) It's easy to put in and take out of the vehicle and it's super comfy for babe too.
customer_reviews.author: BonP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend!! I did some comparisons and this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would recommend!! I did some comparisons and this one had everything I was looking for and product was as expected for Graco!!
customer_reviews.author: David Mesa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. This is my third child. so convenience and comfort are what I was after. My little loves the seat as well. He started sitting in it about 6 months when he no longer liked laying back in his infant seat. we are now at 17 months still rear facing and he is happy because it sits him up a little.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, easy adjustment, hard to tighten
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. It ranked only a 4 because the straps are hard to get tight in the rear facing position, and the crotch strap is a bit short, so the buckles press into baby's chubby thighs. Though, she still has the infant body pad under her, so maybe that will be remedied when the pad is taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smulligan

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is awesome! It lays so far back and is super easy to install AND remove, the anchors are the best, you push a button to open and close the hook vs the hooks you have to stick your hand into the seat to hook on and off. I love it and so does my daughter, wish I had this one for the first 10 months!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! i have a maxi cosi for my 2.5 year old and it is SO harc to lose and tighten the straps so I decided to try this seat for my youngest once he was ready to switch out of his infant seat. I have to say it exceeds my expectations and I LIVE the latch for asjuatint the straps, it truly makes the seat/ my son seems very comfortable In his seat and I especially like the head protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is awesome! I'm so happy we found this one
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is awesome! I'm so happy we found this one. We were originally going to get the 5 inch extender so my 4 year old daughter could stay rear sitting but they were out of stock and I found this one and it arrived the last week and we love it. My daughter is very comfortable and we also ordered one for my two year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of ok product. I don't have major complaints. It is little heavy and bulk - that's it. I wish there was little more space in my car for this.
customer_reviews.author: kaykay

customer_reviews.title: great car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat enough to buy a second one for baby #2! Easy to clean, easy to install, grows with them. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Great pick. Cup holders are to handy. Whether it’s a cup holder Or used to hold toys. I actually bought another one for the other car, and one for my sister’s car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Really easy to install. My baby has plenty room in this car seat. The only negative thing in my opinion is, that the textile is not breathable. My baby is sweating right on the area where she's leaning her head against.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

product_meta.title: Graco Size4Me 65 Convertible Car Seat, Matrix
product_meta.description: Graco's Size4Me 65 featuring Rapid Remove Cover Convertible Car Seat holds a rear-facing infant from 4-40 lbs. and forward-facing child in its 5-point harness from 22-65 lbs. It easily grows with your child with the Simply Safe Adjust harness system, which automatically adjust both your harness and head rest height, with no rethreading. Quickly remove the machine-washable Rapid Remove Cover without uninstalling the seat for extra-easy cleaning. Size4Me65 features the exclusive In Right LATCH system for one-second LATCH attachment, removable head/body support, three recline and two buckle positions. It's designed to help keep your child safe and comfortable wherever you go together. Buckle may be cleaned with a damp cloth
feature_bullets: Designed to help protect your rear facing infant from 4 40 lbs. and your forward facing toddler from 22 65 lbs.
Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the height of your harness and headrest to 8 positions, in one motion, to ensure that your child is always properly secured

Side impact tested in addition to meeting or exceeding all applicable U.S. safety standards, the Size4Me car seat has been side impact tested for occupant retention solely with the built in 5 point harness system
Machine washable Rapid Remove cover removes quickly, without uninstalling the toddler car seat
In Right LATCH system for an easy, one second LATCH attachment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars564 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
